author: greystroke
content:
Benedikt and Julian Ma published a new encrypted mempool design called Hybrid Encrypted Mempools. It prevents liveness issues from a threshold committee with user reveal and prevents MEV issues from user reveal with a threshold committee. 

The main contributions are:
- Consider the hybrid design of threshold committee and user reveal
- Explore how threshold committees could work in the context of Ethereum
- Highlight the cryptographic requirements Ethereum may have for a threshold committee

https://ethresear.ch/t/hybrid-encrypted-mempools/23360
